thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely Hotel - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: zoeclarke23
title: Lovely Hotel
text:
Second stay at the hotel within the last year, we can not fault it. Upon arrival we got offered a room upgrade and free wifi brilliant start to the holiday, maid come in every day done a wonderful job, rooms can be small the previous years one was, but it's New York so kinda expected. Everything is so close in walking distance, Times Square, Grand central, Empire State, Rockefella all with in a ten min walk we didn't eat or drink at the hotel so can not comment on that. All the staff are friendly and polite.
We will defiantly be back hopefully next March :)
